1�Teleport?Yes, please.No, thank you.
1�Obtain this item?
1�Obtain the #?????Yes.No.
1�Relinquish your claim to the battle spoils?Yes.On second thought...
1�What will you say?It'll be all right!Trust in me!
1�L-Larzos!
1�A-and...Ringaling and Portia!
1�Shame on you for betraying Lilisette and  's trust! Turning your coats!
1�Even you, Portia...
1�What!? I won't stand for such slander! Hisss!Unlike you unsavory bunch, we fight to realize an ideal, Goddess-sanctioned world! We fight for great justice!

1�Those words are the only truth to have come out of you this whole time! The entire encounter!We're no wardens of spite, I assure you, but there'll be a more opportune time to resolve the issue of names.
1�Let's finish this once and for all! Put an end to this overlong struggle!
1�You speak of Lilith. Your alternate self.
1�We can triumph over you! Overcome darkness!With our own hands and paws, we'll pull up your future of death and destruction by the roots!
1�Aaah!
1�A-Atomos is devouring their memories. B-both of theirs.
1�Once it completely engulfs the dark future--claims it for the void--it should fall into stasis.
1�Noooooo!
1�Atomos, you mustn't eat ?[him/her]! Inedible!
1�Wh-what!? No...
1�A-Atomos!?
1�Altana preserve!It's gone and overreached itself! Over-exerted!
1�It-it must've tried to devour the memories of the Goddess and the Dark Divinity both! Swallowed more than its fill!
1�Oh, thank the Goddess you haven't taken harm!We must quit this place without delay! Put distance between it and ourselves!
e!�Hm? Has Atomos...stopped?
1�Should Lilisette succeed in closing the gateway, Atomos will gradually revert to a petrified state. Fall into a deep slumber.
1�The process may take years--perhaps decades--but the Distorter of Time will eventually become dormant. Distort time no more.
1� . I fear the hour of our parting, too, has come. Time to say goodbye.
1�My mission here is accomplished. The purpose of my existence fulfilled.
1�The Goddess needs no longer weep. No further call for sorrow.As such, I must make like a tear and dry up. Disappear.
1�Thank you,  .It's been swell fighting alongside you. Had myself a gay old time.
1�I forgot how I promised to be of use to you! Serve you well!
1�Yes, forgot! Failed to remember!
1�But I can help you! No, not in the way you might hope. Our world has rules, too. Ways of doing things. Must abide properly.
1�Rules which go beyond the world of man. Encompass the entirety of all universes and dimensions.
1�Don't ask me why! I didn't make them, I just play by them!
1�Or have you forgotten all you have learned? Had your memories consumed? Let us then wake them up with a spar! A contest of claws!
1�I'll let you decide what's best.
1�I'll return these to you. If you have need of me, just use them and I'll come bounding to your side.

1�Curiosity may have killed the cait, but indecision is what'll finish you. If you decide to use them, they'll be gone forever whether you triumph or fail, so you'll have to start from square one. Make a fresh beginning!
1�Imagine what a pain it would be to slink around to all those places again!
1�Don't worry your tail off. Now that I'm as good as new, one place should be enough. More than sufficient.
1�I'll be here grooming myself whenever you're ready. Good to go.
l!�Hehehe! What more to expect from the Champion of the Dawn?
1�I...no, all the Cait Siths...will lend you our strength. All of our capabilities.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�The contract is complete. Signed and sealed. I'll fight by your side as long as you draw breath.
1�Hehehe, what's wrong? I can't stand long speeches. Did you expect something special?
1�That's it! Show's over! Go with Altana, esteemed Champion of the Dawn!??
1�...I can't do that. It's something well beyond my powers. Physically and magically impossible.
1�Besides, her departure was her own wish, in the end. When I think how she was prepared to... No, I can't...
1�But surely you don't require a thorough explanation. A total rundown. One of the Goddess's wings is too clever for that.
1�I must make like a tear and dry up. Disappear.
1�Do you remember those words? My soliloquy?
1�There's no sense in hiding the truth for you, so I'll let it all out. Come clean.What remains of me here is but a fragment...
1�That's right, I'm a simple ghost. An apparition.
1�I cannot tell whether I shall be permitted to stay or if I shall fade. Evanesce. But I shan't give up for so long as you have need of me.
o!�Hmm...nyan?
1�I'm not kitten with you. Did you already forget what I said? Your skull that empty?
1�You'll have to go to one of the places I mentioned before. A single journey.
1�How can I expect to fight you when my spiritual reserve is running low? Completely out of juice? I know you'd rather not, but you'll need to do some more traveling to try again!
1�A promise is a promise!
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�Are you sure? Completely pawsitive?
1�Understood. Perfectly clear.Consider your wish granted.
1�The contract is complete. Signed and sealed. I'll fight by your side as long as you draw breath.
1�Hehehe, what's wrong? I can't stand long speeches. Did you expect something special?
1�That's it! Show's over! Go with Altana, esteemed Champion of the Dawn!??
1�...I can't do that. It's something well beyond my powers. Physically and magically impossible.
1�Besides, her departure was her own wish, in the end. When I think how she was prepared to... No, I can't...
1�But surely you don't require a thorough explanation. A total rundown. One of the Goddess's wings is too clever for that.
1�Which, by the way, is what's about to happen anyway!
1�It's Atomos! It's multiplying and replicating itself!
1�Hut-tut! Don't think I'm oblivious as to what's going on here! That I am utterly without clue!
1�You're trying to wrest Atomos's power for your own nefarious ends!
m!� , look out!
1�You foul creature! Masked madman! I'll fight you tooth and claw!
1� , have you been declawed or something!? Lost all your gumption!?
1�With Atomos weakened, your ??bright future?? is naught but dust scattered before the wind!
!?�Before he was completely drained, he gobbled it all up--I saw it with these two eyes!
1�And you call yourself a savior of Vana'diel! A protector of the realm!
1�Did you actually want to save the future, or did you just want to take credit for it!?
1�Hmph.
1�You think I'm full of bluster and bravado? Then let me show you what I'm made of. Demonstrate all that I can do.
s?�My whiskers can tell your fortune better than any old bones.
1�And right now, they're telling me that your best chance to meet Iroha is to head back to Norg.
1�Oh, no...I forgot to tell them...
1�For someone who came from the future, his form here was quite solid. Wholly unyielding.
1�I have a feeling that he--and his other masked companions--exist in this timeline as well.
1�And then there's something else I saw for a brief moment. Laid my eyes on for a fleeting instant.
1�The eyes never lie, but...it can't be...
1�Well, well, if it isn't  , come back to say hello and give ?[his/her] regards.
1�And what a most curious curio you've brought along.
1�A timely compass, for a timely place. Yet who could fashion something so mysterious?
1�Is this friend of yours human?6In the end, it matters not. Makes not one iota of difference.
1�Oho! You wish to use this and go to a different world. One where your god of darkness exists.
1�That world was a bit less...successful than Vana'diel, and its name has been lost to the annals of history. Utterly wiped from the record.
1�I've never been one to pussyfoot around a difficult situation, but even Atomos couldn't make me go in there.
1�But if you really want to go through with this, I'm not about to stop you.
1�A word of caution. A bit of a warning: you'll be accosted by Altana-knows-what from the moment you draw your first breath.
1�A glutton for punishment, then? There's a whole buffet waiting for you just beyond.
1�Forks and knives at the ready?
1�Perhaps that's for the best. Lack of forethought can only lead to failure. End in travesty.1��
1� , I knew you would come back. Return to me.
1�Things have gotten a bit hairy since you were last here. I helped you before, so now it's your turn to lend me your aid. Listen to my plight.
1�You and I were supposed to be bosom buddies, but the whole time you were just one-sidedly suckling at my teat...
1�You've always been such a good friend. A friendly do-gooder. So pure of heart, in fact, that I'm sure you can hear her calling out.
1�Close your eyes and open your ears...
1�So? Can you hear her calling out to you? Asking you things?
1�Only when you can feel her heart and spirit will you be able to fully comprehend. Wholly understand. Please, help her.
1�You see, Lilisette is fighting tooth and claw in her world, leading the just against the profane. The ones who wish to harm our world.
1�Their raids on Shadow Kindred strongholds have sowed chaos and prevented the sinister forces from making further inroads.
1�But now they've set their beady little eyes on something bigger...Atomos.
1�They want their foothold to turn into utter domination, and are trying to use the Walk of Echoes to return to the past. Our past.
1�Lady Lilith is a magnanimous maiden compared to them, and they leave no hope in their wake. Everything shrouded in despair.
1�You really did it,  ! She could hear you! Understand what you said!
1�Spoken like a true Champion of the Dawn!
1�The time's come to quit catting around and tell you what's going on.
1�Everything Lilisette said was true. Fully verified. She ventured to the dark future and sealed the cavernous maws--which are being forced open by the Shadow Kindred.
1�They haven't found the trump card, though--the entrance to the past here in the Walk of Echoes.
1�Lilisette has trapped those few who've stumbled close, but there's limits to what she can do on her own.
1�Not to say that I didn't help. Lend a hand. But everything happened so quickly...
1�...And it takes all my strength to frazzle the gates that connect this world to that one.
1�The arena within is burgeoning with demons and threatens to burst. Explode into bits. They even poked their heads out a bit.
1�But they realized they couldn't come barreling through the entrance like a crazed goobbue. Perhaps they're smarter than I thought...
1�But we can't sit here wringing our hands while Lilisette is holding them back in that arena!
1�You'd be proud of how strong she's become. Despite the circumstances, it will be a meeting all Vana'diel will remember!
1�I'll take the plunge and tell her you're right behind me...which I assume you will be.
r!�Are your heads spinning? Twirling round and round? Never fear, the rift is stable as long as I'm here.
1�Of course, holding this thing open means that I can't help you...but I'm with you in spirit!
1�With a tag team like you two, Vana'diel's got nothing to fear! Get in there and pummel them into a million itty-bitty bits!
1�Hmm...I had a feeling this would be the case. Feline intuition.
1�The ability to open a cavernous maw doesn't depend on mere strength or potency.
1�It's...the key.
1�Atomos, the Distorter of Time, sometimes gives birth to these abnormalities. They're like little babes, cooing toward the darkness.
1�Precisely. Beyond doubt. It fused with the demon's corporeal form and opened up an entrance.
1�A sobering truth, indeed.
1�Luckily for us, we managed to separate it...but we can't just leave it sitting here like an apple fallen from a tree. Someone will find it, and then...
1�Therefore,  , I nominate you to squish it. Poof.
1�Nyan
1�With him inside, you'll be able to call forth his powers to aid you.
1�Though you may not be able to call on him now, surely the day will come when you will harness his might to serve you.
1�Normally a pact is required for an avatar to bond...but this was a special case. An anomaly. Treat that newfound power like you would a helpless child.
1�But for her to leave this behind means that she trusts you above all else.?[ Or do I sense something more?/ Always value those with whom you've parted.]
1�<Sigh>She should have just given it to you herself. But that would have been unbecoming, wouldn't you say?
1�The bonds between you are unseverable. Of that I can be certain.
1�Of course, that didn't prevent me from making her a similar one of you--or did I stick my paws in too far this time?
1�No matter the physical distance between you, you'll always serve as the Goddess's wings, your hearts and thoughts united as one.
1�Never forget that.Ever.
1�The bonds between you are unseverable. Of that I can be certain.
1�No matter the physical distance between you, you'll always serve as the Goddess's wings, your hearts and thoughts united as one.
1�Never forget that.Ever.
1�Not that you need remindin', but you're all out of playin' pieces.No amount o' strugglin' will avail you now, so why don'tcha save us all some trouble and give up?
1�You and yours seek to prevent the true future from comin' to pass.Me and mine, on the other hand, have taken up arms against Altana's will.
1�Fact is, both our existences are sinful in the eyes o' the gods, and there ain't no changin' that.

1�So you'd face us as the ?? �[Zero/One/Two/Three/Four/Five/Six] Spitewardens.??Now that I've called you that, though, most like you lot'll be bleatin' about wantin' some new, more virtuous-soundin' name.
1�Whatever the outcome, the end'll see these grounds awash with the blood o' scoundrels.
1�<Pant, pant>...
1�So this is...<gasp>...the power o' the Goddess...
1�Tempered in the blazin' forge...<wheeze>...o' her children's hopes and dreams.
1�You've proven yourself...worthy o' my respect.
1�I'm gutted that my time's up...but there's no helpin' it.Victory belongs to they...who want it more.
1�Have no fear. I value their lives...above my own.
1�As my final act...I will see them...to safety.
1�Farewell...bearers of Altana's will.
1�Sir Ragelise...O' those who fought the war...none was more valorous...more honorable than you.
1�The folks o' both realities...know this well.
1�For the sake o' the future...it don't matter which...
1�Hah. A creature as near a beastman as makes no difference would presume to admonish me?
1�My soul is for sale to neither god nor man.
1�There existed an enemy that wanted for vanquishing. I merely made a choice--one that granted me the power I needed to accomplish my objectives.
1�I, for one, could care less for justice and utopias.
1�We glaze our words with honey and put on a righteous facade, but in truth we're naught more than power-starved scoundrels.
1�Even as I stood engulfed in the cold flames of the underworld, I became awakened to my deepest, darkest desires.'Twas such an epiphany as I had never known.
1�For all my gallantry and talk of honor, what truly drove my existence was the feel of hard steel in my hand as it cleaves the flesh and bone of mine enemies, spilling their lifeblood.
1�I have all my life been a soldier. By the sword have I lived, and by it shall I die.I shall slay the Shadow Lord...or perish in so trying.
1�I have chosen my path, as you have yours. There's naught to say nor do now but stay our resolve and see things through to the last.
1�The stage is set for our decisive battle...and there is no lack for cast members.
1�Let it begin. Set free your inner beast...and come at us with all your strength!
1�'Twould appear...mine eyes did not deceive me.You are every ilm...the ?[man/woman] I marked you for... .
e.�But a world without Sir Ragelise is like a world bereft of light. I could not abide in such a place.
1�Unnngh...
1�All futures...stand equal...
1�As a one-winged bird...knows not the skies...
1�A one-armed scale...serves not its purpose...
1�Naught is exempt...from the absolute law...
1�Atomos...chooses not...
1�GraAaAaaa...AAaaAgh...
1�How...could this be?
1�How could I lose...?
1�As a child, that girl was no different from who I was.But the unending strife of the Crystal War forced her to walk a path far more grueling than my own.
1�To restore a measure of peace back to the world, she chose to take on the burden of immortality.And it changed her. Irrevocably.
1�Truth be told, I envied her so.
1�But above all, possessed of absolute power.Time and again I found myself yearning to have even a fraction of her strength. Then perhaps I might've made a greater difference.
1�We've come to reclaim our future!We won't allow things to go your way any further!
1�I know of your suffering, as if it were my own.In my dream, I felt the grief and pain that engulfed you.
1�I understand the burden you willingly chose to bear, all for the sake of mankind.
1�We're connected right to the core of our being. You know this to be true.
1�Tell me, Lilith. Is there no way to stop Atomos and disentangle our two realities?
1�Unless we do something, our worlds will collapse!
1�B-but, this means your future will vanish as well, and everyone with it!
1�I...I don't want that to happen.I want both our realities to continue existing, side by side. I've come to realize this now.
1�The gates? You mean...Atomos?But how can that be done?
1�From both your world and mine?
1�M-me? Replace you?
1�Seems like there's no other way.
1�I understand. I'll do as you ask.
1�I...can't leave with you. The gates...they must be closed.
1�Unless somebody stops the two realities from breaching one another, there's no future for us--for anyone.
1�I must cross over to the world of strife and seal off Atomos from there.
1� . As I seal off Atomos from Lilith's world, I need you to do the same in ours.
1�And then we must keep watch over it, making certain that the two realities collide no more.
1�Patiently and resolutely, until the day Atomos turns to stone.
1�Come what may, I won't ever forget you.
1�The countless journeys we embarked upon...The battles we fought, the insurmountable odds we overcame...
1�Every single moment we spent together--even the mundane--I will treasure for all my days.
1�Cait Sith.  .From the bottom of my heart, thank you. For everything.
1�So this is the Walk of Echoes...
1�So you mean the futures of a thousand worlds all collide here?
1�I would have expected it to be brighter and more full of hope.
1�Before I found myself, I would have run away from such a dismal place.
1�But now that I've seen what the future may hold, I won't. I can't.
1�I'll follow you to the ends of Vana'diel,  ! Let's go.
1�I don't understand what...
h!�The future is for us to decide--not you!
1�Even if there are some things I would change, I still love this world!
1�Yes, some crosses are difficult to bear and we lash out at things we find unjust...
1�But our future is supposed to be bright and full of laughter, not wracked with despair!
1�Nothing can stop me from protecting all that Vana'diel can be. Nothing!
1�Even if there are some things we would change, we still love this world.
1�Yes, some crosses are difficult to bear and we lash out at things we find unjust...
1�But our future is supposed to be bright and full of laughter, not wracked with despair!
1�Nothing can stop us from protecting all that Vana'diel can be. Nothing!
1�After my impassioned speech, too... Oh, I can be so scatterbrained.
1�But I made my bed, so I've got to lie in it.
1�But this masked man...this ambassador of the void...I get the sense that he's holding back.
1�If he was able to bring Atomos to its knees, then he could obliterate us with a snap of his fingers--but he didn't.
1�Hey now, [/ Cait Sith,] come off it!
1�For someone complaining so loudly, your hands are quite warm from hiding them under your posterior!
w!�But it stings to admit that there's a kernel of truth in that. What do we do now?
1�There's still the idea of meeting Altana, but how does one go about finding a goddess?
1�Perhaps your friend Iroha can provide us with answers.
1�After all, she's the one who bid you to absorb light into your orb.
1�If she thinks that there's still some light left to gather, then the future may not be as doom-and-gloom as Cait Sith thinks.
1�And you got all that from your whiskers?6If that's what you say, then I'll choose to believe you, I suppose.
1�The best course of action is for us to split up.
1�I've been charged with protecting Lilith's world, so I can't stay here for long.
1�I've got responsibilities to finding out about  [Lilith's future/the past]. I'm sorry that I've got to prioritize that.
1�But just like that orb, I'll always be there by your side.
1�Never forget that.
1�Be safe,  !
1�So you finally come.
1�Your clash with my Spitewardens was a sight to behold.
